Verify 'Search' input field font size 16px, width 300px, height 40px, and padding 8px 12px
Verify 'Search' input field aria-label 'Product Search Input'
Initiate video playback for 'promo_video.mp4'
Verify video is not muted, is playing in fullscreen mode, and playback controls are visible
Verify video player's dimensions are 1920x1080px when fullscreen
Verify video content has aspect ratio 16:9, and its load time was under 1s
Verify video source is 'promo_video.mp4'
Click the navigation link 'About Us'
Verify 'About Us' link background color changes to #e9ecef, text color changes to #0056b3 from #007bff, and 2px solid #0056b3 bottom border appears
Verify 'About Us' link text content 'About Us', font weight 600, positioned at x 700, y 20 from top-left, width 100px, and height 30px
Trigger the 'Contact Support' modal
Verify modal is visible, centered on screen, has width 500px, height 350px, background color #ffffff, opacity 1, and border radius 8px
Verify overlay has background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5)
Verify modal's top position is calculated to be (viewport_height - 350px) / 2
Verify 'User List' table displays exactly 10 user entries
Verify each user row is aligned to the left, has height 50px, and border-bottom 1px solid #eeeeee
Verify table header is visible and sticky
Verify table header first column 'User ID' has font weight 700 and color #333333
Scroll down the page
Verify header remains fixed at top (top 0, left 0), has background color #ffffff, height 60px, border-bottom 1px solid #e0e0e0
Verify logo image inside header has source 'logo.png'
Verify header's padding is 10px 20px
Verify 'My Account' text inside header has font size 15px
Open the 'Category' dropdown
Verify dropdown menu is visible, contains exactly 5 items, has width 200px, height 180px, and is positioned 40px below the dropdown button
Verify selected item's text is 'Electronics', its background color is #f0f0f0, and its text color is #333333
Click the 'Remember Me' checkbox
Verify checkbox becomes selected, has width 18px, height 18px, border 2px solid #007bff when selected, and background color changes to #007bff
Verify associated label 'Remember Me' is visible
Verify checkbox aria-label 'Remember me checkbox'
Submit a form with invalid data

Verify error message 'Please enter a valid email address.' is visible, has text color #dc3545, font size 14px, top margin 10px, aligned to the left, padding 5px 0px, background color transparent, and font family 'Inter, sans-serif'
Verify 'Volume' slider value is 75%, total width is 200px, height 8px, and border radius 4px
Verify 'Volume' slider track's active segment has background color #007bff
Verify 'Volume' slider handle is visible, its x position corresponds to 75% of the track length
Verify 'Volume' slider aria-label 'Volume control'
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify tooltip 'Click for support' becomes visible, has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, padding 5px 8px, border radius 3px, positioned 10px below 'Help' icon, and opacity 1
Observe the file upload progress bar
Verify progress bar value increases from 0% to 100% within 5s
Verify progress bar filled segment has background color #28a745
Verify progress bar total width is 400px, height 10px
Verify progress bar smooth transition of width property during the upload
Verify text '75% Uploaded' is displayed when the value is 75%
Select '2023-10-26' in the date picker
Verify date picker input field displays value '10/26/2023', font size 16px, and width 150px
Verify selected date cell has background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Verify date picker calendar is visible, has border 1px solid #cccccc
Verify 'Today' button is enabled
Type 'wireless headphones' into the search bar
Verify placeholder text 'Search products...' disappears
Verify input field's value is 'wireless headphones'
Verify search icon with source 'search_icon.svg' is visible on the right
Verify search bar's width is 400px, height is 45px, font family 'Roboto, sans-serif', and border is 1px solid #999999
Verify 'Product Card' has width 300px, height 450px, border radius 10px, background color #ffffff, padding 15px, and shadow with opacity 0.1
Verify product title 'Smartwatch X' has font size 20px and color #333333
Verify main image is loaded with rendered dimensions 280x200px
Open a page with long content
Verify scroll position is initially at scroll-top 0px and scroll-left 0px
Scroll down the page
Verify scroll-top value increases to 500px
Verify custom scrollbar (if present) has width 8px and track background color #f1f1f1
Verify main content area has height 800px and is visible
Hover over the 'View Details' link
Verify 'View Details' link text color changes to #0056b3 from #007bff with transition duration 200ms, and text decoration changes from 'none' to 'underline'
Verify 'View Details' link font weight 500, font size 14px, y position remains constant during hover, and padding 2px 0px

Verify 'Info' icon source 'info_icon.svg', rendered dimensions 24x24px, alt text 'Information icon', color #6c757d, visible, right margin 5px, natural dimensions 48x48px, no border, and aria-label 'More Information'
